title: Drawing, "Design for Three Geometric Motifs", 1936
medium: Pen and black ink, yellow pastel, graphite on cream tracing paper
inscribed: Inscribed in black ink, lower center: VERMEIL [crossed-out] MAT-BRILLANT/ PLANS SUPERPOSÉS INDIQUÉS EN CHIFFRES; left, under design: 1; right: JP/36; interior of design:  2.2/1; center, under design: 2; right:  J.P/36; interior of design: 4, 3, 2, 1; right, under design: 3; right:  J>P>/36; interior of design: 5/4/3/2/1/1
provenance: Fomerly in Puiforcat Orfevre archives, Jim Finguerra, John Finguerra
creditline: Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra
description: At left, square design overlaid with 4 conjoined L-shapes with circles in their right angles; at center, square design overlaid with 4 conjoined lobes overlaid with 2 intersecting rectangles with 2 circular rings at each end, at right, square design overlaid with 4 pairs of conjoined triangles centered by 2 intersecting diamond shapes which are overlaid with an octagon and a circle.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Design for Three Geometric Motifs", 1936.
1936. Pen and black ink, yellow pastel, graphite on cream tracing paper. Gift of John Finguerra in memory of his brother Jim Finguerra. 1995-164-2.
